COMMON.OPERATION_FAILED: There was an error; please try again
COMMON.UNAUTHORIZED: You don't have the permissions to acces the page
COMMON.FORM_HAS_ERROR_TO_CHECK: One or more values are not not allowed; please check and try again
COMMON.TO_CONFIRM_TYPE_CORRECT_CODE: To confirm the operation, type the correct code.
COMMON.SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong; please, try again
COMMON.EXIT_EDIT_MODE: Exit from edit mode and cancel changes

TOPICS.NAME: Name
TOPICS.ROLES_ALLOWED_TO_MAKE_QUESTIONS: ESN Accounts roles allowed to ask questions
TOPICS.DATES_IN_FAVORITE_TIMEZONE: Dates must be set in the timezone {{timezone}}

PUBLISHING_OPTIONS_.DRAFT: Keep as draft (only admins can see)

TOPICS.LIVE_OPTIONS_I: Choose your messaging preferences for the topic
TOPICS.SHOULD_BE_LIVE_ON_I: Based on the agenda, choose the forecasted date and time for the topic to go live.
TOPICS.SHOULD_BE_LIVE_ON_II: Note: this setting doesn't automatically open the topic.
TOPICS.QUESTIONS_MUST_BE_SIGNED: Questions must be signed (can't be anonymous)

QUESTIONS.SUMMARY_II: Insert a brief title so that people can quickly understand what the question is about.
QUESTIONS.CONTENT_II: You can add here below your full question.
QUESTIONS.YOU_WILL_LOSE_THE_CONTENT: You will lose all the content you didn't save.

DASHBOARD.NEWS_I: Bulletin board from the GA Chairing Team.
DASHBOARD.USEFUL_LINKS_I: Access more information through these sources.
DASHBOARD.STATISTICS_RECAP: In the last {{days}} days, we had {{users}} visiting users from {{countries}} ESN countries.

DEADLINES.NAME: A description for the deadline
DEADLINES.DATE: The date and time of the deadline
DEADLINES.DATES_I: Note: the deadline must be set in the timezone {{timezone}}.
DEADLINES.TARGET: The target group/people of the deadline
DEADLINES.ACTION: The kind of action related to the deadline
DEADLINES.ACTION_COLOR: A color to visually represent the action

ARCHIVE.CHOOSE_FILTERS_AND_SEARCH: Choose some filters in the action bar above to search through archived elements.
ARCHIVE.NO_ELEMENT_FOUND_WITH_FILTERS: No archived elements found with the filters selected

CONFIGURATIONS.ENTITIES_I: Manage the general entities of the platform.
CONFIGURATIONS.ADD_USERS_BY_THEIR_USERNAME: Add users by their ESN Accounts username.
CONFIGURATIONS.ADMINISTRATORS_I: Users in this list can manage the whole platform.
CONFIGURATIONS.OPPORTUNITIES_MANAGERS_I: Users in this lists can open and manage opportunities.
CONFIGURATIONS.BANNED_USERS_I: Users in this list won't be able to add questions, messages, etc.
CONFIGURATIONS.NO_BANNED_USERS: Luckily, no banned users so far.
CONFIGURATIONS.EMAIL_TEMPLATES_I: Set the templates for the following notification emails.
CONFIGURATIONS.GIVE_BADGES_I: Badges are usually earned through automatic actions, but here you can force them.

CATEGORIES.NAME: Name
CATEGORIES.CANT_DELETE_IF_USED_WARNING: The deletion will fail in case the category is used in any topic. In that case, prefer the archive action instead.
CATEGORIES.CANT_DELETE_IF_USED_ERROR: You can't delete a category if it's used in at least a topic.

EVENTS.NAME: Name
EVENTS.CANT_DELETE_IF_USED_WARNING: The deletion will fail in case the event is used in any topic. In that case, prefer the archive action instead.
EVENTS.CANT_DELETE_IF_USED_ERROR: You can't delete an event if it's used in at least a topic.
EVENTS.DOWNLOAD_SUMMARY_SPREADSHEET_I: You can download a spreadsheet containing questions and answers of this event's standard topics; note: live topics are not included.

ATTACHMENTS.TAP_TO_ADD_ATTACHMENT_I: The preferred format is images or PDF documents. Max size of 50MB per attachment.

PROFILE.FEEDBACK_OR_HELP: Send feedback or ask for help
PROFILE.NO_BADGES: No badges so far. While you're using the Q&A tool, you will earn some. Go get them all and make your ESNer friends envy you!
PROFILE.YOU_EARNED_A_BADGE: Congrats!! You've earned a shiny new badge!

BADGES_I.FIRST_QUESTION: Congrats for starting your way into the Q&A app!
BADGES_I.PEER_PRESSURE_MINHO: Pedro asks, you deliver. Just in time before GA Minho's deadline.
BADGES_I.QUESTIONS_MASTER: This is the way! Asking lots of healthy questions help the Network grow stronger.
BADGES_I.NEWCOMER: You're finally acclimating to the tool. We are happy about it!
BADGES_I.KNOW_IT_ALL: Soooo many questions, but you saw it through. Amazing job!
BADGES_I.LOVE_GIVER: You're a true supporter! Continue smashing that upvote button!
BADGES_I.POKEMON_HUNTER: You did catch'em all! Every candidates knows you now.
BADGES_I.RISING_STAR: You're the bright future of our Network. Congrats, candidate!
BADGES_I.CHEERGIVER: The appreciation round is your arena! As loud as you can be.
BADGES_I.CHAIRING_WIZARD: You know how it feels to be on the other side of the desk. Be sure to stand up from time to time!
BADGES_I.SHOW_MAKER: If there's some fuss, you're around. Drama is your bread and butter.
BADGES_I.MIC_CATCHER: The boogeyperson of the Speakers List and the GA Administrator's worst nightmare.
BADGES_I.JOKER: The sovereign of the spam chats. The memes master. The jokes authority.
BADGES_I.ENERGY_DRIVER: You are like a magnet: people float around your endless energy: on fire!
BADGES_I.FABULOUS_SCRIBE: Your pen work is helping the Network be better. You should be proud!
BADGES_I.ONLOOKER: Nothing escapes your sight! Thanks for sharing your superpower with us.
BADGES_I.PLENARIES_RUNNER: Such legwork: how many calories did you burn? Thank you!
BADGES_I.SPECTATOR: Maybe you're not in the centre of the action, but damn, such a spectator. Enjoy, my friend!
BADGES_I.MEDUSA_ONE: A unique badge for a unique person. Stay amazing as you are!
BADGES_I.RAPID_ROCKET_SPEAKER: Faster than the speed of sound. Eminem is that you?

EMAIL_TEMPLATE.HTML_I: Set an HTML template for the email to send.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.VARIABLES_ALLOWED: The template can contain the following variables:
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: Subject
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.BAD_TEMPLATE: The template seems to have some problems. Please check its correctness.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.TEST_TEMPLATE_I: A test email with the template currently active will be sent to your email address.

VARIABLES.USER: The full name of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.QUESTION: The summary of the question

MESSAGES.QUESTION_SUMMARY_II: A brief title to help people quickly understand what is about.
MESSAGES.QUESTION_CONTENT_I: If you want, you can add the full question here below.
MESSAGES.QUESTION_CONTENT_P: It will help with the minutes as well — thank you!
MESSAGES.YOU_WILL_LOSE_THE_CONTENT: You will lose all the content you didn't save.
MESSAGES.DELETE_AND_BAN_USER_I: The user won't be able to send messages until you remove the ban from the Configurations.
